comments: Volume of a sphere with radius n (rounded to the nearest integer). - _Wesley Ivan Hurt_, Jan 28 2014
references: H. Gupta, A Table of Values of N_3(t), Proc. National Institute of Sciences of India, 13 (1947), 35-63.
N. J. A. Sloane, A Handbook of Integer Sequences, Academic Press, 1973 (includes this sequence).
N. J. A. Sloane and Simon Plouffe, The Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences, Academic Press, 1995 (includes this sequence).
links: T. D. Noe, Table of n, a(n) for n = 0..1000
maple: A002101:=n->round(4 * Pi * n^3/3); seq(A002101(n), n=0..100); # _Wesley Ivan Hurt_, Jan 28 2014
mathematica: Table[Round[4 Pi n^3/3], {n, 0, 100}] (* _T. D. Noe_, May 24 2013 *)
author: _N. J. A. Sloane_.
